name: New Balance Fresh Foam 1080
description: Experience cushioning like never before with the Fresh Foam 1080. Designed for runners seeking maximum comfort and support.
title: Ultimate Comfort Running Shoe

name: New Balance FuelCell Propel
description: Elevate your running game with the FuelCell Propel. Its responsive cushioning and sleek design make it a top choice for performance.
title: Responsive Performance Running Shoe

name: New Balance 990v5
description: A classic reinvented. The 990v5 combines timeless style with modern comfort, making it a must-have for sneaker enthusiasts.
title: Iconic Lifestyle Sneaker

name: New Balance Fresh Foam Hierro
description: Tackle the trails with confidence in the Fresh Foam Hierro. Its rugged outsole and plush cushioning provide stability on uneven terrain.
title: Trail-Ready Cushioned Hiking Shoe

name: New Balance 574
description: A timeless classic, the 574 offers a versatile style that complements your casual look. Its retro design never goes out of fashion.
title: Classic Retro Sneaker

name: New Balance Fresh Foam Cruz
description: Step into comfort with the Fresh Foam Cruz. Its sleek silhouette and plush cushioning make it perfect for everyday wear.
title: Everyday Lifestyle Sneaker

name: New Balance FuelCell Echo
description: Push your limits with the FuelCell Echo. Its energy-returning cushioning helps you achieve your best performance on the track.
title: High-Performance Track Shoe

name: New Balance 1500
description: Experience speed and style with the 1500. Designed for runners who demand lightweight responsiveness and a sleek look.
title: Speed-focused Running Shoe

name: New Balance Fresh Foam Roav
description: Roam the streets in comfort with the Fresh Foam Roav. Its versatile design and plush cushioning make it an urban essential.
title: Urban Comfort Lifestyle Sneaker

name: New Balance Minimus Prevail
description: Take your training to the next level with the Minimus Prevail. Its minimalist design offers lightweight support for gym workouts.
title: Minimalist Cross-Training Shoe
